solution_line_template: Donny was charged ${small_apple_price} x {num_small_apples} = $<<{small_apple_price}*{num_small_apples}={small_apples_total}>>{small_apples_total} for the small apples.
He was charged ${medium_apple_price} x {num_medium_apples} = $<<{medium_apple_price}*{num_medium_apples}={medium_apples_total}>>{medium_apples_total} for the medium apples.
And he was also charged ${num_big_apples} x {big_apple_price} = $<<{num_big_apples}*{big_apple_price}={big_apples_total}>>{big_apples_total} for the big apples.

Therefore, Donny has to pay ${small_apples_total} + ${medium_apples_total} + ${big_apples_total} = $<<{small_apples_total}+{medium_apples_total}+{big_apples_total}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} for all the apples.
